properties.title: Urban Pollinator Corridors
properties.description: Students map native flowering plants and create micro-corridors that reconnect fragmented habitats across the city. The project tracks pollinator return with monthly surveys and photo logs.

properties.title: Highland Reforestation Nursery
properties.description: A youth cooperative grows indigenous seedlings and partners with local farmers to restore degraded slopes. Community workshops share soil and water conservation practices.

properties.title: Savanna Wildlife Coexistence Map
properties.description: Young researchers interview households to map wildlife movement and identify conflict hotspots. The team co-designs low-cost deterrents and safe livestock routes.

properties.title: Mangrove-to-Market Stewardship (Land Edge)
properties.description: Youth leaders restore mangroves near coastal farms, then build sustainable livelihoods through community nurseries and monitoring trails that link restoration to local income.

properties.title: Watershed Clean Streams Lab
properties.description: A student-run lab tests stream health (pH, turbidity, nitrates) and publishes a public dashboard. Cleanup days combine data collection with storytelling.

properties.title: Mountain Trail Erosion Repair
properties.description: Youth volunteers repair trail drainage, install erosion bars, and document before/after photos to reduce sediment entering alpine lakes.
